pages.text: You can pet your pet pups!$(br2)Just right click on them, with an empty hand, to give them those well deserved pets!

If your tamed pet loses all health, fear not!$(br)Make a $(item)bandage$() from 'save your pet' and you can revive them!$(br2)Don't take too long though, eventually they will bleed out.$(br)This will take at least one minecraft day though.

pages.title: Pet bandages
pages.text: These work on all tamed vanilla animals, not only dogs.

pages.title: Golden pet bandages
pages.text: These work on all tamed vanilla animals, not only dogs.$(br2)Also heal more.
